Text:
The day after the tournament. Many have gathered,
forming a long line to challenge Annerose.

(...There are more people than I expected. How many
are there?)

(No matter the number, I'll fight them with
everything I've got...!)

As to be expected from a former member of Velgalta's
Seven Blades, you're quite the popular figure.

Why are you here, Goldy? Did you come to challenge
me?
Hahah. You've gotta be kidding.

I was being serious...but I guess that's not why
you're here?

...I'm just here to watch. Maybe I'll get to see you
lose.

Fine by me! I'm hoping for opponents of that
caliber.
Tsk... You really are an infuriating one.

If you're just here to observe, stay back. I'm about
to begin.

Thank you all for gathering. I'll take you on one by
one, starting from the front of the line.

Underestimating us, huh? Declaring victory already
against this many of us...
I'll go first! Don't complain if it ends here, eh?

I'll turn everything into a learning experience...
Bring it on!
Hyaaaahhh!!!
Agh...! Aahh...

That challenger was no match for your power level.
But he's just the first. Let's see what happens
next...
Haaah!!!

...That's the tenth one. These opponents are no
match for you.

Hey, what's with the silence? I'm giving you a rare
compliment.
...It doesn't make me happy.

All these challengers, fighting desperately.
Isn't this what you wanted?
Yes, at least I thought it was. But...

(No matter how many of them I defeat, there's no
sense of satisfaction... I won't gain anything at
this rate.)

(How can I become like Mundane? Let me recall his
actions and his words...)
...That's right! He restricted himself with weights!
Goldy, I'm leaving this to you for a while.
Huh?
I need to prepare something. I'll be right back.

W-Wait! Where do you think you're going?! Prepare
what?!
...Sorry to keep you waiting.

You sure took your time! Even with my quick tongue,
it was all I could do to keep the crowd entertained—
...What the heck is that?

I learned this from him. By adding weights, I can
train while fighting.

...You must be insane. You think you can rely on
what you learned from him?

It may seem insane...but if I don't do this, I can't
reach his level!

...Right then, sorry to keep you waiting.
Let's resume.
In that case, it's my turn now! Hyaaaaah!!!
Haaah!!!
Gyaghh!!!
(The weights are slowing me down...but...)
I'm not done yet...!

You're adding more weights...?! What're you even
trying to do...?
Come on, who's up next?!
I'll be your next opponent... Brace yourself!
Bleeech...!
(This isn't enough to satisfy me!)
She's adding even more weights...?!
More...and more!

You all can do better than this! Don't give up!
Swing your swords with everything you've got!

We all have infinite potential! Believe in yourself
and keep fighting!
Why is she encouraging the challengers...?
That woman... She might just be an idiot.
